import Tabs from '@theme/Tabs';
import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';

# Theming


## Theme

<Tabs groupId="lang">
  <TabItem value="javascript" label="Javascript" >
    ```javascript title='theme.js'
    export const theme = {
      color: {primary: "#F8D210", secondary: '#F51720'},
      padding: (index) => (index * 2) + 'px',
      font: {
        title: {
          family: 'Arial',
          size: 16,
        }
      },
    };
    ```
  </TabItem>
  <TabItem value="typescript" label="Typescript" default>
    ```typescript title='theme.ts'
    export const theme = {
      color: {primary: "#F8D210", secondary: '#F51720'},
      padding: (index) => (index * 2) + 'px',
      font: {
        title: {
          family: 'Arial',
          size: 16,
        }
      },
    };

    export type Theme = typeof theme;

    declare module 'bomonti' {
      export interface DefaultTheme extends Theme {}
    }
    ```
  </TabItem>
</Tabs>

## Provider

```javascript
import { ThemeProvider } from 'bomonti';
import { theme } from './theme.mdx';

function App() {
  return (
      <ThemeProvider value={theme}>
        ...
      </ThemeProvider>
  );
}
```

## Use value from theme

```javascript title='theme.ts'
import { Text, View } from 'react-native';
import styled from 'bomonti';

export default function TabOneScreen() {
  return (
    <Container>
      <Title>Tab One</Title>
      <Seperator />
      <Content>...</Content>
    </Container>
  );
}

const Container = styled(View)(({ theme }) => ({
  flex: 1,
  alignItems: 'center',
  justifyContent: 'center',
  backgroundColor: theme.color.primary
}));

const Title = styled(Text)({
  fontSize: 20,
  fontWeight: 'bold',
  color: ({theme}) => theme.color.secondary
});

const Seperator = styled(Text)({
  marginVertical: 30,
  height: 1,
  width: '80%',
  color: ({theme}) => theme.color.secondary
});

const Content = styled(Text)({
  color: ({theme}) => theme.color.secondary
});

```
